briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Valsartan/Amlodipine in Patients With Mild to Moderate Essential Hypertension
officialTitle: A Multi-national, Multi-center, Double-blind, Randomized, Parallel Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Valsartan/Amlodipine 160/5 mg to Valsartan 160 mg Alone in Patients With Mild to Moderate Essential Hypertension Not Adequately Controlled With Valsartan 160 mg Monotherapy
summary: This study assessed the efficacy and safety of the valsartan/amlodipine 160/5 mg single-pill combination in patients with uncomplicated essential hypertension not adequately controlled (MSDBP ≥90 mmHg and \<110 mmHg) on valsartan 160 mg alone.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Mean Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure (MSDBP) From Baseline to Week 8 Endpoint
